titles.title: A resolution to refer S.745 entitled "A Bill for the Relief of Hardwick, Inc.," to the Chief Judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 203.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/2/1993--Introduced. Refers S. 745 (a bill for the relief of a specified corporation) to corporation) to the Chief Judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims.
